Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tower

  • public class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
    Tower class allows creation and manipulation of tower objects which are towers of type disk
    Author:
    Jack Ambery

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tower()
      Constructs tower by instantiating tower as a new stack of type object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawTower(java.awt.Graphics g, int xPos, int yPos)
      Draws a tower utilizing Disk's draw method.
      java.util.Stack<Disk> getTower()
      Allows access of tower by other classes
      boolean isEmpty()
      Determines if tower is empty
      Disk peek()
      Returns but does not remove the top disk from tower
      Disk pop()
      Removes and returns top disk from tower
      void push(Disk disk)
      Adds disk object to the top of tower
      int size()
      Returns number of disks in tower
      java.lang.String toString()
      Puts tower into a string format by listing radius of each disk in tower

      • push

        public void push(Disk disk)
        Adds disk object to the top of tower
        Parameters:
        disk - to be added to tower

      • pop

        public Disk pop()
        Removes and returns top disk from tower
        Returns:
        top disk from tower

      • peek

        public Disk peek()
        Returns but does not remove the top disk from tower
        Returns:
        top disk from tower

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns number of disks in tower
        Returns:
        integer number of disks in tower

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determines if tower is empty
        Returns:
        true if no disks in tower, false if at least 1 is present

      • getTower

        public java.util.Stack<Disk> getTower()
        Allows access of tower by other classes
        Returns:
        tower field

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Puts tower into a string format by listing radius of each disk in tower
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String of integers representing the sizes of radiuses in tower's disks

      • drawTower

        public void drawTower(java.awt.Graphics g,
                      int xPos,
                      int yPos)
        Draws a tower utilizing Disk's draw method. A drawn tower is a stack of drawn disks spaced so disks are touching.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object drawing the various pieces
        xPos - x-coordinate of tower
        yPos - y-coordinate of tower, iterated to vertically stack disks
